name: Alone (itch) (Luak Games)
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Alone  -  a game about how more is less.

Space   A   D  -  controls

How does the game fit the theme? -  the smaller each level gets, the harder, and more intense the levels get. (if that didn't make sense just ask in the comments and I will explain)

This is a dark 2d platformer that is mainly story-driven. The story is written by Ella kitchens, music is by tony toy, and the art, code, and sound is by luak games (me)

If you enjoyed the game please tell me in the comments, this was my first game jam (that i have finished on time)

if you want to learn more about me go to luakgames.com!
